name: Potions Apprentice
description:
-Story-

You are learning alchemy as an apprentice in a potion shop. But one day your mentor is not around and a customer knocks at your door, so you have to brew a potion for the customer by yourself. You don't even remember which ingredient is which... 

-Gameplay-

Brew some random potions, drink them, experience weird effects, compare them with existing recipes and figure out what ingredients are the right ones!
